commit.message:
re PR target/18925 (Invalid gprel relocation in PIC)

	PR c++/18925
	* class.c (layout_class_type): Determine the visibility of static
	data members.

	PR c++/18925
	* g++.dg/ext/visibility/staticdatamem.C: New test.

From-SVN: r92120

files.patch:

+	PR c++/18925

+	data members.
